abstract: The question of parenting has become of increasing interest to economists.
snippet: The question of parenting has become of increasing interest to economists.
lead_paragraph: In a piece for the Week in Review, I take a look at the most recent yin and yang of the parenting world: Amy Chua, author of “Battle Hymn of the Tiger Mother,” vs. Bryan Caplan, an economist at George Mason University who argues in “Selfish Reasons to Have More Kids” that parents should relax, because nature matters much more than nurture.

headline.main: Nature vs. Nurture, as Seen by Economists
